ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Ghost faction (was Treasure changes in Frontier Mou ntains)
ygData.msgSnippet: Just be careful of the 2 patrolling Crusaders at that gate.  I got wacked by them once yesterday as I was turning in my 1800 bone chips. My monk can now bank
ygData.messageBody:
Just be careful of the 2 patrolling Crusaders at that gate. I got wacked by
them once yesterday as I was turning in my 1800 bone chips. My monk can now
bank and train in Cabilis :) Also be aware this quest does NOT raise the
Necro faction. The only way I have found to raise it is by killing the
Forsaken (the various Iksar bandit types)

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 12, 2000 8:13 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Ghost faction (was Treasure changes in Frontier
> Mou ntains)
>
>
> If you get to dubious with the guards you can give bone chips
> to the trooper
> in Field of Bones to raise all your other Cabilis factions as IIRC.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:garramone@...]
> Sent: Saturday, June 10, 2000 5:15 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Ghost faction (was Treasure changes in Frontier
> Mou ntains)
>
>
> it depends, there are at least 4 different factions in
> cabilis. you may
> just be ok with the guards.
>
> Shada
>
> > I haven't
> > been to Cabilis
> > yet but with all the ghost faction I've gotten while in the
> > Overthere it
> > might be possible that I can roam freely in there.
> >
> > Galtin
>
